channel.title: Problems with game
channel.description: When I start a chapter or a mod , the game is not responding . How to fix this problem ?

item.title: Problems with game
item.dc:creator: ItsMeOnly
item.description:
It would be better to provide more details, a console log perhaps, or even steam log if you start the game via it…

It may also be that the mod you have is incompatible with the Source SDK used in linux version. Certainly starting a chapter doesn’t freeze game for many people (including myself).

Read full topic
